pullrequest.title: Building Editor: Individual wall segments instead of polylines

content.raw:
We were talking about snapping to XY (issue #408) and you said to have it off by default and on with a hotkey. Then I said it was the opposite behaviour from the angular snapping, so you said it might be best to have them all turn on with the hotkey. 

Somewhere you had also mentioned to snap to 45 degrees instead of 90... I've been using this branch for a while, and I would suggest changing it to 15 instead, like it is when grabbing on the default branch.
content.html:
We were talking about snapping to XY (issue #408) and you said to have it off by default and on with a hotkey. Then I said it was the opposite behaviour from the angular snapping, so you said it might be best to have them all turn on with the hotkey.

Somewhere you had also mentioned to snap to 45 degrees instead of 90... I've been using this branch for a while, and I would suggest changing it to 15 instead, like it is when grabbing on the default branch.
